Quantitative Systems Biology 2019 (October 28th and 29th)
Location Programme Register Speakers Talks Poster

Programme

The workshop will run all day on Monday October 28th 2019. Student talks will be invited and delivered on Tuesday October 29th in the morning, with a scientific networking event which will run in the afternoon.

The workshop shall be held at the Strand campus of King's College London - see here for more details.

The talks will be held in the Council Room. Lunch and tea/coffee will be served in the River Room, where the poster session will also take place.

Full schedule to be announced here soon. Please see the QSB twitter for future updates.


Quantitative Systems Biology 2019 (October 28th and 29th)

  • The QSB Organising Committee
  • qsbw@outlook.com

QSB2019 - student-led workshop, 28th - 29th October 2019, Strand Campus, King's College London.
